title: Checkout returning 500 error on mobile browsers
recommended_action: Escalate to payments team; reference incident INC-2024-09-10

title: Users unable to reset password via email link
recommended_action: Check email service logs; send manual reset link

title: Slow page load times on dashboard
recommended_action: Collect performance logs; check backend latency spikes

title: Subscription renewal failing for some users
recommended_action: Ask user for failed payment ID; verify with billing provider

title: API responses intermittently returning 429 rate limit errors
recommended_action: Inform customer to reduce request frequency; check rate-limit config

title: User avatars not updating after upload
recommended_action: Clear CDN cache for user; verify file upload service

title: Unable to log in using Google OAuth
recommended_action: Check OAuth callback logs; verify Google Cloud credentials

title: High error rates on bulk data import
recommended_action: Request sample CSV; escalate to data ingestion service team

title: Billing invoice not generated for new accounts
recommended_action: Verify billing job scheduler; manually trigger invoice run

title: FAQ: How to enable two-factor authentication
FAQ: How to export account data
recommended_action: Provide instructions for account export from settings

title: Emails not being delivered to certain domains
recommended_action: Check SMTP logs; verify domain reputation and DKIM

title: Intermittent logout due to expired session tokens
recommended_action: Check session TTL configuration; ask user for approximate logout timestamps

title: Corrupted or unreadable attachments uploaded by customers
recommended_action: Request user to reupload file; verify file-processing pipeline logs
